# delegate

**Instance Property**

The delegate you use to manage changes to a split view interface.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any UISplitViewControllerDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The split view controller uses its delegate to manage showing and hiding related view controllers. For more information about the methods you can implement in your delegate, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISplitViewControllerDelegate].

## Customizing the split view transitions

- **UISplitViewControllerDelegate**: The methods adopted by the object you use to manage changes to a split view interface.
